songs.title: Say My Name/Cry Me A River/Praise You/Genie In A Bottle (Cover)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Say my name, say my name
If no one is around you, say baby I love you
If you ain't running game
Say my name, say my name
You acting kinda shady
Ain't calling me baby

[Verse 1]
I feel like I've been locked up tight
For century of a lonely nights
Waiting for someone, to release me
You're licking your lips
And blowing kisses my way
But that don't mean I'm gonna give it away
Baby, baby, baby
(Baby, baby, baby)

[Verse 2]
You told me you loved me
Why did you leave me, all alone?
Now you tell me you need me
When you call me on the phone
Girl I refuse
You must have me confused
With some other guy
Your bridges were burned
And now it's your turn
To cry, so

[Chorus]
Say my name, say my name
Cry me a river
And then rub me the right way
Say my name, say my name
Cry me a river
And then rub me the right way

[Verse 3]
The music's fading
And the lights down low
Just one more dance
And then we're good to go
Waiting for someone
Who needs me
Hormones racing at the speed of light
But that don't mean it's gonna be tonight
Baby, baby, baby
(Baby, baby, baby)

[Verse 4]
Girl I refuse
You must have me confused
With some other guy
Your bridges were burned
And now it's your turn
To cry, so

[Chorus]
Say my name, say my name
Cry me a river
And then rub me the right way
Say my name, say my name
Cry me a river
And then rub me the right way

[Bridge]
Come a long, long way together
Through the hard times and the good
I have to celebrate you baby
I have to praise you like I should

We've come a long, long way together
Through the hard times and the good
I have to celebrate you baby
I have to praise you like I should

[Chorus]
Say my name, say my name
Cry me a river
And then rub me the right way
Say my name, say my name
Cry me a river
And then rub me the right way

[Outro]
I have to praise you
I have to praise you
(And then rub me the right way)
Say my name, say my name
Cry me a river
And then rub me the right way
